params._bidId: The id of the loan bid to get the payment amount for.
params._timestamp: The timestamp at which to get the due payment at.

params._bidId: The id of the bid/loan to get the borrower for.

returns.borrower_: The address of the borrower associated with the bid.

params._bidId: The id of the bid/loan to get the lender for.

returns.lender_: The address of the lender associated with the bid.

params._bidId: The id of the loan bid to check for.
The id of the loan bid to check for.
The id of the loan bid to accept.
The id of the loan to make the payment towards.
The id of the loan to make the payment towards.
The id of the loan to make the payment towards.

params._APR: The proposed interest rate for the loan bid.
params._collateralInfo: Additional information about the collateral asset.
params._duration: The recurrent length of time before which a payment is due.
params._lendingToken: The lending token asset requested to be borrowed.
params._marketplaceId: The unique id of the marketplace for the bid.
params._metadataURI: The URI for additional borrower loan information as part of loan bid.
params._principal: The principal amount of the loan bid.
params._receiver: The address where the loan amount will be sent to.

calculateAmountDue(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the minimum payment amount due for a loan at a specific timestamp.

getLoanBorrower(uint256).notice: Returns the borrower address for a given bid.

getLoanLender(uint256).notice: Returns the lender address for a given bid.

isLoanDefaulted(uint256).notice: Checks to see if a borrower is delinquent.

isPaymentLate(uint256).notice: Checks to see if a borrower is delinquent.

lenderAcceptBid(uint256).notice: Function for a lender to accept a proposed loan bid.

repayLoan(uint256,uint256).notice: Function for users to make a payment towards an active loan.

repayLoanFull(uint256).notice: Function for users to repay an active loan in full.

repayLoanMinimum(uint256).notice: Function for users to make the minimum amount due for an active loan.

submitBid(address,uint256,uint256,uint32.notice: Function for a borrower to create a bid for a loan with Collateral.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Bid storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256,uint256,uint256)
function (struct Bid storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256,uint256,uint256)
